name: CMIS Spaces Flex+AIR,+Browser Clients
short_description:
Multi-platform (Desktop and Mobile) Flex / AIR based RIA Clients for any CMIS-compliant repository (like Alfresco).

Based on FlexSpaces (minus Alfresco specific features like workflow, etc.) and uses CMIS APIs instead of calling custom Alfresco webscripts.

Downloads and source now only available at:
www.code.google.com/p/cmisspaces/

Developed by Integrated Semantics:
  integratedsemantics.org
  integratedsemantics.com
